A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I freaking LOVED this movie. I have yet to talk personally to anyone that did not. I have one Facebook friend (that I know of) who did not like it\, but he is notoriously fussy about such things.  It was a fun adventure story\, full of unintended consequences and interesting surprises. I am not sure what is wrong with some people.  Maybe it's that fans\, especially Star Wars fans\, love to hate new product (which has been true since Return of the Jedi).  Or maybe it is alt-right bots who hate that a woman could be right\, and that Luke and Finn and Poe could be wrong.  I don't care.  This score does not seem to reflect any offline reality.
